data.title: ET Leadership Excellence Awards 2024 honours the leadership and innovative prowess of these trailblazing entrepreneurs
data.meta_description: The ET Leadership Excellence Award at Holiday Inn Lucknow Airport on June 23, 2024, honored 39 leaders. Asim Arun and Ronit Roy presented awards. Sudhir Mishra, Yawer Ali Shah, and Dr. Sandeep Kapoor spoke. Directed by Shiv Shankar Awasthi, the event emphasized gratitude, dedication, and celebrated excellence, unity, and hard work in leadership.
data.text:
Synopsis

The ET Leadership Excellence Award at Holiday Inn Lucknow Airport on June 23, 2024, honored 39 leaders. Asim Arun and Ronit Roy presented awards. Sudhir Mishra, Yawer Ali Shah, and Dr. Sandeep Kapoor spoke. Directed by Shiv Shankar Awasthi, the event emphasized gratitude, dedication, and celebrated excellence, unity, and hard work in leadership.

The prestigious ET Leadership Excellence Award ceremony took place at the Holiday Inn Lucknow Airport, an IHG Hotel, on June 23, 2024. This grand event celebrated 39 distinguished awardees who have demonstrated exceptional leadership and made significant contributions in their respective fields. Asim Arun, Social Welfare, Minister of State (Independent Charge), and Hindi film actor Ronit Roy felicitated them.

Hon Asim Arun Social Welfare, Minister of State (Independent Charge) at the ET Leadership Excellence Award

The venue, Holiday Inn Lucknow Airport, provided a perfect setting for the occasion. Under the expert direction of Shiv Shankar Awasthi, the hotel's director, the event unfolded seamlessly. The event opened with a spectacular speech on leadership by Sudhir Mishra, Editor of the Navbharat Times. This was followed by Yawer Ali Shah (Co-founder and CEO of AMA Herbal Group), who spoke about sustainable business. Dr Sandeep Kapoor, Managing Director of the upcoming super speciality hospital Health City Vistaar, spoke about leadership in the healthcare sector.

Bollywood actor Ronit Roy at the ET Leadership Excellence Award

The awardees came from diverse backgrounds, including business, education, healthcare, sports, and social services. Each awardee was recognised for their outstanding achievements and the positive impact they have had on society. The celebration highlighted their stories of hard work, dedication, and innovation, inspiring everyone present.

The evening recognised individual accomplishments and celebrated leadership and vision. The awardees were praised for their ability to drive change, overcome challenges, and set new benchmarks in their industries. Their contributions were acknowledged as pivotal in shaping the future and fostering growth in their communities.

Group photo of all awardees at the ET Leadership Excellence Award

One of the highlights of the event was a group photo of all 39 awardees, capturing the essence of unity and shared success. The photograph symbolised the collective spirit of excellence and leadership that the ET Leadership Excellence Award aims to promote.

Awasthi expressed his gratitude for hosting such a significant event. He emphasised the importance of recognising and celebrating leadership, as it inspires others to strive for greatness. He further added, “This association reflects the relentless dedication, passion, and hard work of our exceptional team. Each member has played an integral role in shaping Holiday Inn Lucknow Airport into the epitome of luxury and hospitality. We are deeply honoured to associate with this prestigious award night, and we remain committed to exceeding the expectations of our cherished guests.”
